name: HOUR GLASS CURVES WORK OUT WAIST TRAINER
description:
ARE YOU READY TO GET FIT???

Shed excess water and slim your waist down fast with this easy-to-use Hour Glass Curves Work Out Waist Trainer. Feel the burn as the soft rubber foam material heats up your mid section, helping you shed those last few pounds and giving you that look you desire. When you combine this waist reduction training belt with the regular exercises, you can witness excellent and quick results. You can even wear it while doing your regular activities such as watching TV or doing household chores. Remember this product can only assist in the loss of belly fat and cannot tone your abdominal muscles. You must continue to exercise regularly for maximum results. 


Maximum compression, slims by 2-3 inches, aids in weight loss

	

The band itself is constructed from a latex core with a soft cotton exterior and interior lining. It sits at your waist, extending to the upper abdominals. Two columns of hook-and-eye closures allow you to size the garment to fit your body. The steel bones anchor the waist trainer and prevents it from moving while you are engaged in activities.

RESULTS
•Midsection control
•Increased thermal activity
•Loss of inches  
•Mobilizes fat cells
•Stimulates perspiration


This item comes in blue, purple, or pink. Please specify your color preference in your order details.  
Combine Super Colon Cleanse and lose up to 15lbs in a month.

name: WAIST TRAINER & COLON WEIGHT LOSS DETOX COMBO
description:
Consider that 400-600 million dollars are spent annually on laxatives in the United States. Every year 126,000 Americans are diagnosed as having colorectal cancer. Of this population, 44% will die as a result of the disease. At least two million Americans suffer from colitis, ileitis, diverticulitis and 100,000 Americans have a colostomy each year.

 
Colon Facts:
(you don't want to miss!)
Our colon (large intestine) is as long as we are tall.
The diameter of our colon is equal to that of our wrist. 
For every foot of colon we can store approximately 5 - 10 lbs. of feces. 
A healthy "bowel movement" will measure 12 - 18 inches long.
A healthy person will have 2 -3 bowel movements each day. 
The ascending colon controls the aging process in the body.
The colon re-absorbs fluids 8 - 10 times every 30 minutes. 
The colon has pressure points similar to the reflexology points on our hands and feet.
To the degree your colon is clean, is to the degree your bloodstream is clean. 

Detox your colon and eliminate old waste and parasitic toxins and lose up to 15lbs in a month. Waist train 4-6 hours a day and lose up to 4-5 inches in a month.
Combine the waist trainer of your choice with a colon detox to maximize your hourglass transformation. 

(Excluding the leopard waist trainer) Please specify if you want the Firm Compression Waist Trainer, or the Work Out Waist Trainer in your notes.
